name: Gourgeist
flavorText:
Singing in eerie voices, they wander
town streets on the night of the new moon.
Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
formDescription: Forms have different stats.  Gourgeist's size is set as a Pumpkaboo, and cannot be changed.
